LightningComponentBundle.description: Present content from a remote JSON source.

property.name: feedUrlEndpoint
property.label: JSON Feed Url
property.description: Ensure a remote site setting record exists for the URL in Salesforce.

property.name: feedType
property.label: Feed Type
property.description: This controls how the results are displayed. The 'Test' value can be used to see a layout when there is not JSON feed connected.

property.name: listErrorText
property.label: 'List has error' text
property.default: Failed to return any items. Ensure a remote site setting record is created for the URL you're using.

property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom class name
property.description: Custom CSS class name. Usually remains blank.

property.name: debug
property.label: Debug?
property.description: Triggers console.logs if debugger is enabled
